pages.text:
Peridot Chickens are a species of silicate mineral chickens. Technically, it is gem-quality magnesium-rich olivine. Peridot is one of the few gemstones that occur in only one color; however, its tint can vary from yellowish olive to brownish green.
Lay Item: Peridot Gems.$(br2)Peridot crystals have been harvested from pallasite meteorites.
